title: PBE signups?
body: when will we be able to signup for pbe?

replies.body: Sadly we still don't have an exact date on when the signups for PBE will be opened back up again. We'll be sure to give some kind of heads up before they come back though!
ok thank you and just wondering is kayn going to be 6300? or 7800?
Brand new champions typically start out at 7800 IP for a few weeks before dropping down the to normal 6300!
Do you know which (4800 ip) champion will be discounted in addition to Kha'zix once Kayn gets released?
I have been waiting 3 months for PBE is there any expected month or am I going to have to wait a year. I got the email before it was taken down, but it got stuck in my spam until now.
